sources.title: Temptation (1946)
sources.description: After marrying an archaeologist, a Victorian-era woman with a sordid past realizes that she is not ready to settle down with one man. Watch on RetroFlix.org: https://retroflix.org/temptation-1946/

sources.title: TEMPTATION
sources.description: After marrying an archaeologist (Brent), a woman (Oberon) with a sordid past realizes that she is not ready to settle down with one man, to say the least!

metadata.Plot: In a flashback, late-Victorian beauty Ruby, a divorcee with a shady past, calculatingly marries rich Egyptologist Nigel, who installs her at his Cairo estate while he digs for mummies. Bored, Ruby undertakes to recover a friend's letters from Baroudi. But when she meets the blackmailer, mutual attraction leads to an affair. As Ruby gets in deeper, she finds Baroudi is even more unscrupulous than she dreamed.
metadata.Writer: James B. Fagan, Robert Hichens, Robert Thoeren
metadata.Actors: Merle Oberon, George Brent, Charles Korvin
